text: Uye munyika mune tunzvimbo twakavakidzana, nemapindu emagirepi, uye zvirimwa zvinyoro, uye miti yemadheti, inokura iri miviri kana nhatu kubva pamudzi wemuti mumwechete, kana uri muti mumwechete kubva pamudzi umwe, inodiridzirwa nemvura imwe cheteyo, asi mamwe acho tinoita kuti ave akanaka kupfuura mamwe pakudya. Zvirokwazvo, muzvinhu izvi mune humboo kuvanhu vanonzwisisa
